column3: It should be possible to test this by checking out the commit prior to d6492d4ed053e2b9088a9666dc55c7417c7d4c70 and then applying the commit of this pull request. Then a few minutes or hours of fuzzing should give an assert.

ACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23408/commits/fa4baf0756c792630391ed456aaa15285ad6eb52\n\nRead through the code, but haven't tested it yet. This is a good change; giving the fuzzer more hints about how to construct structurally-valid scripts will hopefully help explore more code-paths and, at the very least, should help save cycles.
